IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Regional Visitors Bureau, Destination Marketing Organization
IRS990.MissionDesc: Regional Visitors Bureau, Destination Marketing Organization
IRS990.Desc: The Bureau promotes travel and tourism to the area by assisting in the recruitment and scheduling of conventions and by supplying promotional information to tourists and other visitors and travelers.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization is exempt from federal income taxes under Section 501(c)(6) of the Internal Revenue Code but is required to pay taxes on unrelated business income. The Organization has been determined by the Internal Revenue Service not to be a private foundation within the meaning of Section 509(a) of the Code. Federal taxes on unrelated business income, if applicable, are provided at the statutory rate.
